title: UNHRC: Who is reversing the sacrifices of Sri Lanka’s soldiers?
content: By Shenali Waduge A country that remains the ONLY country that has annihilated the scrooge of terrorism should be feeling proud of the achievement and not have to send emissaries to go begging for support against Resolutions. What kind of victory is this to be made to feel sorry for eliminating terrorists? Who is advocating…
